thread.title: Profitable Health Supplements E - Commerce

title: Profitable Health Supplements E - Commerce
text: Questions Business Summary Growing, profitable, home-based, online business. Established in 2013, owners have successfully grown the business through developed and tested marketing strategies. Seller believes sales will double this year. Primary product is a quality testosterone supplement, with the upside opportunity to sell additional healthy lifestyle products. Drop ship with no inventory. You can replace the CEO or he will stay with the business and run it for you so you can be an absentee owner. Call Maggie Pound 619-890-0859 Today! Asking Price: $640,000. Seller financing available:$576,000 DP; Balance SCN for 12 months at 6% interest. Financials
